settings.name: startDelay
settings.description: The start delay (ex. 1m, 1h, etc.), immediate if not specified

settings.name: repeatInterval
settings.description: The repeat interval (ex. 1m, 1h, etc.), doesn't repeat if not specified. When specified with repeat day/time it's only valid value is 1w (all other values ignored and 1w is assumed)

settings.name: startDay
settings.description: The day the process should run (ex. Monday, Tuesday, etc.)

settings.name: startTime
settings.description: The Time the process should run (ex. 08:30, 12:00, 21:00)
